title: 黑龙VS玩家
author: jindong
txt_content: 把这个解压到MC目录的saves里面就OK了，SB都知道，不多解释，去打龙吧。

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-12-13 23:08 
/spawn enderdragon 100
让不让电脑活了

replies.author: Mei灬不是
replies.txt_content:
geludan 发表于 2011-12-13 17:01 
让不让电脑活了
你应该小心手滑按成：/spawn enderdragon 10000...

replies.author: yyy
replies.txt_content: 如果有图就好了，不过还是收了

replies.author: jindong
replies.txt_content:

/spawn enderdragon 100
我一不小心输入过，我本来要输入雪人的 spawn snowman 100 的，就是输入错了，但是没卡爆，我用TNT炸……500级
